plot: Follows the life of Rumi, a geeky girl addicted to boy-on-boy romance, her friend Youko, and two boys who get drawn into their antics.
title: Môsô shôjo otaku-kei
plot_es: Follows the life of Rumi, a geeky girl addicted to boy-on-boy romance, her friend Youko, and two boys who get drawn into their antics.
plot_en: Follows the life of Rumi, a geeky girl addicted to boy-on-boy romance, her friend Youko, and two boys who get drawn into their antics.
